x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Women in Nigeria face barriers to safely reporting domestic or workplace abuse. Reporting systems are fragmented and unsafe.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: SafeSteps – Gender-Based Violence Reporting and Response Portal
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

SafeSteps creates a secure, anonymized digital reporting channel using:

  • App Engine Studio for incident management
  • Flow Designer for automated triage and escalation
  • GRC and VRM for compliance and NGO vetting
  • Scoped Apps with ACLs for strict data control
  • Virtual Agent and GenAI to guide survivors gently through reporting steps

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

SMS/WhatsApp integration for low-internet users and secure cloud storage for case evidence.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Maintaining absolute anonymity for safety
  • Sensitive language tone in Virtual Agent design
  • NGO data validation
